abstract: Marco Balich is the executive director of the ceremony to transfer the Olympic flag to the host of the next Summer Games, Rio de Janeiro.

lead_paragraph: ROME — As the world’s best athletes compete for a spot on the podium at the Olympic Games in London, one Italian is focused on a 10-minute event that will take place once all the medal-giving is over and done with.

headline.main: Media Firm's Olympic Moment to Come After Medals Are Awarded
